bibdata.title: Standard for Wide-Block Encryption for Shared Storage Media
Standard for Wide-Block Encryption for Shared Storage Media
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1619.2/D11, Aug 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies an architecture for encryption of data in random access storage devices, oriented towards applications which benefit from wide encryption-block sizes of 512 bytes and above.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
